title: Ensure passing of the Hive RPC-compatibility tests
body:
As of November 2023, Nethermind [fails](https://hivetests2.ethdevops.io/suite.html?suiteid=1701069858-8bb1348534f7978d2f27408e66ab5b24.json&suitename=rpc-compat) 49 out of 77 RPC-compatibility tests.

The following methods need to be implemented:

- [ ] https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/issues/3419
- [ ] Replace `debug_getBlockRlp` and `debug_getBlockRlpByHash` with `debug_getRawBlock`
- [ ] Implement `debug_getRawHeader`
- [ ] Implement `debug_getRawReceipts`
- [ ] Implement `debug_getRawTransaction`

The following methods fail for both Nethernind and Geth for almost the same reason:

- `eth_blockNumber`
- `eth_createAccessList`
- `eth_feeHistory`
- `eth_getBalance`
- `eth_getBlockByHash`
- `eth_getBlockByNumber`
- `eth_getBlockReceipts`
- `eth_getBlockTransactionCountByHash`
- `eth_getBlockTransactionCountByNumber`
- `eth_getProof`
- `eth_getStorage`
- `eth_getBlockTransactionCountByHash`
- `eth_getBlockTransactionCountByNumber`
- `eth_getTransactionByBlockHashAndIndex`
- `eth_getTransactionByBlockNumberAndIndex`
- `eth_getTransactionByHash`
- `eth_getTransactionReceipt`
- `eth_sendRawTransaction`

Given the above set and the lack of any info on Besu and Erigon in the test run, we need to ensure the test suites themselves are up-to-date and correct.
